item.title: Monday June 11, 2007
item.author: Ryan Clarke
item.description: “Todd Rinkleton blinked. Then he blinked the other one. Something was definitely not right. …” “… and at 8:37 that evening, as scheduled, Todd Rinkleton’s birth certificate expired.” The beginning and ending of a short story I intend to write some day. Ryan Originally posted at classicalRyan.xanga.com
